attributes.action: We the undersigned wish to make it clear that we have no confidence in Rosemary Thew's management and leadership of the DSA and call for her immediate resignation over the new MPTCs and motorcycle test.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the new test has been in planning since early 2000 she has had sufficient time to oversee the planning and instigation of this new test,by sept 29 08 only 39 of the planned 66 test centres will be operational leaving many areas of our country without test centres for up to 12 months causing many motorcycle training buisness to fold without even an apology.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "We the undersigned wish to make it clear that we have no confidence in Rosemary Thew's management and leadership of the DSA and call for her immediate resignation over the new MPTCs and motorcycle test."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19080


Prime Minister's Office
